hsuforum.name: Discussion Forum #1
hsuforum.intro:
Topic: Based on your understanding of evidence informed practice discuss Kligler and Weeks (2014) three steps to forging a common agenda and language around evidence and our expectations of how this informs a collaborative approach to medical practice.

Directions: In each forum, you are required to communicate with your fellow students on a particular topic. You are required to make one post, respond to at least two others, and reply to at least two of your fellow classmates (a total of 5 posts minimum). Your posts should be at least 150 words.
